body.p: fuck dude. the roblox chat update hit everyone with paranoia like a god damn freight train
im getting banned from servers because a bot roaming around is telling everyone my 'condo score' is a whopping zero point nine for having activity in a friend's r34 server ten whole months ago

it doesnt help that everyone sees me as a generational gooner for things like the cleavage in my pfp or that tweet i made back in 2025 march that says "fortnite themed blowjob" or even the section of my site that says i repost furry butts
sigh. whatever man. at least the bot helps with making "educated" guesses instead of willy-nilly accusing furries and gaytards like SOME vigilantes on this god forsaken platform

if you knew me from you vs. homer remasterdn't it is with my great displeasure to say ive been banned from the server let alone lost my role as admin. no more fly rounds or speed rounds unless and until agust becomes fond of me again
